help-file.title: "ETHEREAL FORM"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependant on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
This spell transforms the caster's body into ethereal matter, causing him/ her to be resilient to physical attacks, vulnerable to magical attacks and less prone to takedowns. In this vaporous state, the Ethermancer can pass through doors.
